name: Rajat Sodhi
message: Hello, this Is Rajat, I graduated 1999 batch. I am an architect and live in New Delhi. Currently I am a Professor teaching Design at Sushant University in Gurugram. My work is based around the field of biomimicry - using algorithms and computational design to mimic natural phenomenon and use that to create architectural form. Iâ€™ve built 3D printers and research robotic fabrication. Also a part time carpenter and happy to be here :)
